rules_text:
When Silvershot Crossbow enters, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls. If that creature is transformed, Silvershot Crossbow deals 13 damage to it instead.
Equipped creature has reach and “{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.”
Equip {2} [i]({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
